  • Method Details

    • connectBLE

      public static void connectBLE(String macAddress, android.content.Context context, StudyWatchCallback callback)
      Connect to BLE and returns study watch sdk instance in callback, default MTU = 244, debug = True
      Parameters:
      macAddress - MAC Address of the study watch.
      context - Application context.
      callback - study watch Callback.

    • connectBLE

      public static void connectBLE(String macAddress, android.content.Context context, int mtu, boolean debug, StudyWatchCallback callback)
      Connect to BLE and returns study watch sdk instance in callback
      Parameters:
      macAddress - MAC Address of the study watch.
      context - Application context.
      mtu - MTU for BLE connection.
      debug - debug log messages.
      callback - study watch Callback.
